SEARCH
Package cz.itnetwork.controller

Class InvoiceController

java.lang.Object
cz.itnetwork.controller.InvoiceController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api") public class InvoiceController extends Object
Controller for managing invoices. Provides REST API endpoints for operations related to invoices.

Provides the following services:

  • Creating a new invoice
  • Listing all invoices or filtered invoices
  • Deleting an invoice by ID
  • Retrieving an invoice by ID
  • Updating an invoice by ID
  • Retrieving invoice statistics
Since:
2024

  • Method Details

    • addInvoice

      @PostMapping("/invoices") public InvoiceDTO addInvoice(@RequestBody InvoiceDTO invoiceDTO)
      Adds a new invoice.

      Creates a new invoice based on the provided data. The input data should be in JSON format corresponding to InvoiceDTO.

      Parameters:
      invoiceDTO - object containing the invoice details to be added
      Returns:
      the added invoice as InvoiceDTO

    • getInvoices

      @GetMapping("/invoices") public List<InvoiceDTO> getInvoices(InvoiceFilter invoiceFilter)
      Retrieves a list of invoices based on the provided filter.

      Returns a list of invoices that match the filters specified in InvoiceFilter. The filter may contain various search criteria.

      Parameters:
      invoiceFilter - object for filtering invoices
      Returns:
      a list of invoices as Listinvalid input: '<'InvoiceDTO>

    • deleteInvoice

      @DeleteMapping("/invoices/{invoiceId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> deleteInvoice(@PathVariable long invoiceId)
      Deletes an invoice by its ID.

      Deletes the invoice with the specified ID. If no invoice with this ID exists, it returns an HTTP status code 404 (Not Found).

      Parameters:
      invoiceId - ID of the invoice to be deleted
      Returns:
      response with HTTP status code

    • getInvoice

      @GetMapping("/invoices/{invoiceId}") public InvoiceDTO getInvoice(@PathVariable Long invoiceId)
      Retrieves an invoice by its ID.

      Returns detailed information about the invoice with the specified ID. If no invoice with this ID exists, it returns an HTTP status code 404 (Not Found).

      Parameters:
      invoiceId - ID of the invoice to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the invoice as InvoiceDTO

    • updateInvoice

      @PutMapping("/invoices/{invoiceId}") public InvoiceDTO updateInvoice(@PathVariable long invoiceId, @RequestBody InvoiceDTO sourceInvoiceDTO)
      Updates an invoice by its ID.

      Updates the existing invoice with the specified ID based on the new data provided in InvoiceDTO. If no invoice with this ID exists, it returns an HTTP status code 404 (Not Found).

      Parameters:
      invoiceId - ID of the invoice to be updated
      sourceInvoiceDTO - object containing the new invoice details
      Returns:
      the updated invoice as InvoiceDTO

    • getStatistics

      @GetMapping("/invoices/statistics") public InvoiceStatisticDTO getStatistics()
      Retrieves statistics about invoices.

      Returns statistics about invoices, such as the total number of invoices, total amounts, etc., processed in the format of InvoiceStatisticDTO.

      Returns:
      invoice statistics as InvoiceStatisticDTO
